entities.name_cn: 华为技术有限公司
entities.description: Global provider of ICT infrastructure and smart devices. World's largest telecommunications equipment manufacturer.

entities.name_cn: 华为投资控股有限公司
entities.description: Employee shareholding vehicle ('Union of Huawei Investment & Holding Co., Ltd.') that holds 98.99% of Huawei Technologies

entities.name_cn: 任正非
entities.description: Founder and CEO of Huawei Technologies. Former PLA engineer.

entities.name_cn: 海思半导体有限公司
entities.description: Fabless semiconductor company, wholly-owned subsidiary of Huawei. Designs Kirin mobile SoCs and Ascend AI chips.

entities.name_en: Huawei Cloud Computing Technologies Co., Ltd.
entities.name_cn: 华为云计算技术有限公司
entities.description: Huawei's cloud services subsidiary

entities.name_cn: 中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司
entities.description: Largest semiconductor foundry in mainland China. Allegedly produced 7nm chips for Huawei despite sanctions.

entities.name_cn: 中芯北方集成电路制造（北京）有限公司
entities.description: SMIC's Beijing fab focused on advanced process nodes

entities.name_cn: 深度求索
entities.description: AI lab founded by High-Flyer Capital Management. Developed DeepSeek-V3 and DeepSeek-R1 models. Subject of US congressional investigation.

entities.name_cn: 幻方量化
entities.description: Quantitative hedge fund that founded DeepSeek. One of China's largest quant funds.

entities.name_cn: 中国航空工业集团有限公司
entities.description: Chinese state-owned aerospace and defense conglomerate. Designs and manufactures military aircraft including J-20 fighter.

entities.name_cn: 中航西安飞机工业集团
entities.description: Manufactures H-6 bomber and Y-20 transport aircraft

entities.name_cn: 中国电子科技集团有限公司
entities.description: State-owned defense electronics conglomerate. Parent company of Hikvision.

entities.name_en: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
entities.name_cn: 杭州海康威视数字技术股份有限公司
entities.description: World's largest video surveillance manufacturer. Implicated in Xinjiang surveillance infrastructure.

entities.name_cn: 深圳市大疆创新科技有限公司
entities.description: World's largest consumer drone manufacturer. Subject to various US restrictions.

entities.name_cn: 商汤科技
entities.description: AI company specializing in facial recognition. Implicated in Xinjiang surveillance.

entities.name_cn: 旷视科技
entities.description: AI company known for Face++ facial recognition platform. Xinjiang surveillance involvement.

entities.name_cn: 比亚迪股份有限公司
entities.description: World's largest EV manufacturer. Warren Buffett is a major investor.

entities.name_cn: 宁德时代新能源科技股份有限公司
entities.description: World's largest EV battery manufacturer. Supplies Tesla, BMW, Mercedes.

entities.name_en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission
entities.name_cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
entities.description: Chinese government body that oversees 97 central SOEs on behalf of the State Council

entities.name_cn: 中央军事委员会
entities.description: Supreme military command authority of China. Controls the PLA.

entities.name_en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology
entities.name_cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
entities.description: Regulates industry and IT sector. Oversees telecommunications licensing.

timeline_events.title: Added to BIS Entity List
timeline_events.description: Huawei and 68 affiliates added to Entity List for activities contrary to US national security

timeline_events.title: Cloud Business Spinoff Initiated
timeline_events.description: Huawei begins restructuring cloud computing division as separate legal entity, potentially to isolate from sanctions

timeline_events.title: Foreign Direct Product Rule Extended
timeline_events.description: BIS amended FDPR to cut off Huawei's access to semiconductors made with US technology

timeline_events.title: FDPR Further Tightened
timeline_events.description: Additional 38 Huawei affiliates added; FDPR expanded to cover more third-party chips

timeline_events.title: Honor Brand Divested
timeline_events.description: Huawei sells Honor smartphone brand to Shenzhen Zhixin New Information Technology consortium for $15B

timeline_events.title: Added to NS-CMIC List
timeline_events.description: Huawei designated as Chinese Military-Industrial Complex company under EO 13959

timeline_events.title: Added to BIS Entity List
timeline_events.description: HiSilicon added as Huawei affiliate to Entity List

timeline_events.title: Subsidiary Renamed
timeline_events.description: HiSilicon Shanghai subsidiary renamed to Haibo Semiconductor (海波半导体) - potential sanctions evasion indicator

timeline_events.title: Advanced Node Subsidiary Created
timeline_events.description: SMIC creates new subsidiary for advanced process development ahead of potential sanctions

timeline_events.title: Added to Entity List
timeline_events.description: SMIC added for supplying China's military-industrial complex

timeline_events.title: 7nm Huawei Chip Investigation
timeline_events.description: US investigates whether SMIC violated sanctions by producing 7nm chip for Huawei Mate 60 Pro

timeline_events.title: Added to BIS Entity List
timeline_events.description: Hikvision added for enabling human rights abuses in Xinjiang

timeline_events.title: Overseas Operations Restructured
timeline_events.description: Hikvision restructures overseas subsidiaries, creating new distribution entities in multiple jurisdictions

timeline_events.title: DeepSeek Founded
timeline_events.description: DeepSeek AI lab established by High-Flyer Capital Management

timeline_events.title: DeepSeek-V2 Released
timeline_events.description: DeepSeek releases V2 model with MoE architecture, reducing inference costs significantly

timeline_events.title: DeepSeek-R1 Released
timeline_events.description: DeepSeek releases R1 reasoning model, claiming performance rivaling OpenAI o1 at fraction of cost

timeline_events.title: US Congressional Investigation Launched
timeline_events.description: House Select Committee on CCP opens investigation into DeepSeek's access to US chips and AI models

timeline_events.title: Added to Entity List and MEU List
timeline_events.description: AVIC and subsidiaries added for supporting China's military modernization

timeline_events.title: Added to BIS Entity List
timeline_events.description: CETC added for role in Xinjiang surveillance and military applications
